basic.description: Quantum mechanical treatment of two and three dimensional systems. The hydrogen atom. Spin. Many-electron atoms and the periodic table. Introduction to perturbation theory and Fermi's golden rule. Introduction to nuclear and particle physics.
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Quantum Physics Of Atoms

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: ENPH 344 or PHYS 344 or registered in BSCE.
